parts: Good morning. Is Illinois closed today?
Good morning! Do you mean if the government offices or schools are closed today in Illinois? If so, are you referring to a specific holiday or event?
Now, I wonder if the entire state is closed today.

Ah, I see! States don't typically close entirely, but specific services or offices might be closed for holidays or specific events. Let me check if there's a holiday or event affecting Illinois today. I'll find that information for you.

【0†Skip to main content】 

[Image 0: Flag] 

An official website of the City of Chicago Here's how you know

[Image 1: government] 

The .gov means it's official 

Municipal government websites often end in .gov or .org. Before sharing sensitive information, make sure you're on a City of Chicago government site. 

[Image 2: secure] 

The site is secure.

The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely. 

Get the new, updated COVID-19 and flu vaccines. They're safe, effective, and can be taken together. Learn more at  【1†Chicago.gov/COVIDVax†chicago.gov】.

content.title: City of Chicago :: City Holidays (Offices Closed)

parts:
Illinois is not closed today. There are no state holidays or specific events on June eleventh that would cause the entire state to shut down. Government offices and services should be operating as usual. However, certain city offices, like those in Chicago, might have their own schedules for holidays and closures, but June eleventh is not one of those days.

For further details on specific closures or holidays, you can refer to the Illinois Department of Central Management Services website and the City of Chicago's holiday schedule.
Yeah, no kidding. Is the airport closed today in Chicago?

Chicago OHare International Airport (ORD) Real-time Status  
The status information provided on this site indicates general airport conditions; it is not flight-specific.  Check with your airline to determine if your flight is affected.  
Delays by Destination:  No destination-specific delays are being reported.  
General Departure Delays:  Traffic is experiencing gate hold and taxi delays lasting 15 minutes or less.  
General Arrival Delays:  Arrival traffic is experiencing airborne delays of 15 minutes or less.   
This information was last updated: Jun 11, 2024 at 3:08 AM GMT

###### 25 Jun 2023 | 07:59 AM UTC

# US: Lingering flight disruptions likely at Chicago O'Hare International Airport, Ill., following storms early June 25

## Lingering flight disruptions likely at Chicago O'Hare International Airport, Ill., US, following storms early June 25. Confirm flights

Warning 

【56† transportation 】 

【57† environment 】 

【58† USA 】 

#### Event 

Lingering flight delays and cancellations are likely at Chicago O'Hare International Airport (ORD), Illinois, following severe weather in the region early June 25. Thunderstorms prompted officials to divert several arriving flights to other regional airports and delay multiple departing flights from ORD.

Residual flight disruptions will probably continue through the morning of June 25 as airlines work to clear passenger backlogs.

#### Advice 

Confirm flights at ORD through at least the morning of June 25. Do not check out of accommodation until onward travel is confirmed.

#### Resources

【59†Chicago O'Hare International Airport†www.flychicago.com】

# ALERT Pro-Palestinian protesters blocking road access to Chicago O’Hare Airport

[Image 0: AIRLIVE][Image 1: AIRLIVE]

Last updated: April 15, 2024 16:39

【22†AIRLIVE】  2 months ago

1 Min Read

[Image 2][Image 3]

SHARE

【23† †twitter.com】  【24† †threads.net】 

## Pro-Palestinian protesters are blocking the roadway entering into Terminal 1 at O’Hare Airport.

All outbound lanes near a terminal at O’Hare International Airport were blocked Monday morning on the Kennedy Expressway due to a protest.

O’Hare Airport said that vehicles driving to the airport were expected to be “substantially delayed” due to the protest.

> A demonstration in solidarity with Palestine has resulted in traffic being blocked off leading to O'Hare. Some individuals are sitting in their cars, while others are walking towards the airport.【25†#ohare†twitter.com】 【26†#chicago†twitter.com】 【27†pic.twitter.com/pxy9ZPcU6d†t.co】
> 
> — CHICAGO CRITTER (@ChicagoCritter) 【28†April 15, 2024†twitter.com】

Illinois State Police said it is currently assisting Chicago Police Department with traffic control on I-90.

content.title: ALERT Pro-Palestinian protesters blocking road access to Chicago O'Hare Airport

parts: Chicago O'Hare International Airport is not closed today, but there are some disruptions. There are minor delays for both arrivals and departures, with gate hold and taxi delays lasting around fifteen minutes or less【16†source】【18†source】. Additionally, there are protests near Terminal 1 that are causing significant traffic delays on the roads leading to the airport. The Illinois State Police and Chicago Police Department are managing the situation, but it might take longer to reach the airport by car【19†source】.
